Let's update the breakdown to include the cost of the bike:

**Bike and Accessories:**

* Bike: $2,500
* Accessories: $1,170
	+ Garmin Edge 830: (assuming you already own this)
	+ Bontrager Flare R: (assuming you already own this)
	+ Bike tune-up: $120
	+ New water bottle cage: $50
	+ Bike lock: $50
	+ Other miscellaneous accessories: $950 (unknown items)

Total cost of bike and accessories: $3,670

**Transportation:**

* Bike rack rental or shuttle service: $100-300 (depending on the option chosen)

**Trip Expenses:**

* Food: $30-50 per day (depending on your eating habits and preferences)
* Lodging: $50-100 per night (depending on the type of accommodation and location)
* Other expenses (souvenirs, attractions, etc.): $20-50 per day

Total estimated cost of trip: $500-1,500 (depending on the duration and type of trip)

**Total Estimated Cost:**

* Bike and accessories: $3,670
* Transportation: $100-300
* Trip expenses: $500-1,500

Total estimated cost: $4,270-5,470

It's great that you're thinking about all the costs involved and planning ahead. This will help you prepare for the trip and make the most of your experience on the Blue Ridge Parkway!
